title: Pixel 2 wont charge/turn on. I plug charger and hold power button 4 a few seconds = redlight flashes
content: I have tried all the steps that google suggests, multiple chargers, checking the cable, etc. When i plug in the charger nothing shows on the screen and if i press the power button red light flashes about 2 or 3 times next to the ear speaker. I have even tried charging with a google pixel 3 charger. What should I do?
